0xadF7aFDAdaA4cBb0aDAf47C7fD7a9789C0128C.name: REF Vault — vbUSDC
0xadF7aFDAdaA4cBb0aDAf47C7fD7a9789C0128C.description: Collateral-only vault for vbUSDC (Reference Asset). Oracle prices based on Cork pool exercise value: min(NAV, swapRate × sUSDe/USD × (1 - fee) × hPool).

0xd0f8aC1782d5B80f722bd6aCA4dEf8571A9ddA.name: cST Vault — vbUSDC4cST
0xd0f8aC1782d5B80f722bd6aCA4dEf8571A9ddA.description: Collateral-only vault for cST (Cork Swap Token). Oracle value = 0. Required paired with vbUSDC for the Cork exercise path during liquidation.

0x53FDab35Fd3aA26577bAc29f098084fCBAbE50.name: Borrow Vault — sUSDe
0x53FDab35Fd3aA26577bAc29f098084fCBAbE50.description: Borrowable sUSDe. Deposit vbUSDC + cST as matched collateral to borrow and achieve leveraged yield exposure.
